name: Tazel Limited
description: Developer of financial services platform designed to offer small loans to middle-class Latin Americans. The company's platform helps users to apply digitally so that they can get access to online loans, personal credits, personal loans, and online credits, enabling users to get access to credit in less than half an hour.
